actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-848.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 224 - 136 (Record Vote No: 260).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5490) to clarify the application of title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, and title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5490 (discrimination by recipients of Federal assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5490) to clarify the application of title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, and title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.
